name: Distant Myth
description:
Delve into the Rhythmic Theatre in this reaction based game and Vanquish the Minotaur. A hero stands alone in a Rhythmic test of reaction as he fights back the Minotaur, the longer the Minotaur rages, the angrier it gets, how long will the Hero keep up?

Price: FREE

Platform: Windows, Mac, Linux

Release Date: 21/08/22

✧ Reaction attacks! Press D.F.J.K to fight back against the minotaur's attacks!

✧ Each time you destroy a projectile you gain points, the more points you have the angrier the Minotaur gets, if the hero gets hit by 4 projectiles, his fight is over.

We are a team of three game development students - Jay Starr (@JaybirdStarr), Hugh Kelly (@Clysma), and Gabriella Loyzaga Gibbs (@gabsgibbs). Over the course of 12 weeks, we have worked together to develop Distant Myth.

 In the early stages for this project, we were aiming to draw inspiration from popular rhythm game titles like Muse Dash and Tap Titans. After running through concepts and trialing some ideas, we eventually came to our final product of Distant Myth.
